title: No rewards in loot page
body: After updating leagues I got the pop up to check my missions for rewards and my missions tab is blank. I have no rewards in loot after playing a game either. It seems I was not given any blue essence for my runs nor was I given any skins for rune page buys.

replies.body:
I did get those missions. But the chests form these missionrewards never landed on my lootpage.
Am i missing something?  Can i find the new chests somewhere else in my accountpage?  Or is my lootpage bugged?

Almost the same thing here. I got the popup saying I was gonna be rewarded 33k BE while I was in a queue with my husband. Got into a game at about the same time I hit okay; Almost knew right off the bat that it was gonna bug out. Played the game, ended up winning it, then came out of the post-game screen to see the exact same amount I had the day before (was like 1520,) and only received the quest bonus. This new system stinks to high heaven. Time to find another game to invest in.

I know a lot of this has been a bit confusing, but it looks like only tier 3 runes were being refunded and runes purchased after the price drop (Sept 1st) are *not* being refunded since cost so little.
